title: What font is this?
author: laisantos

comments.content:
Avant Garde Bold seems a likely candidate:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145821/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/")
